    function is_number(a){return !isNaN(parseFloat(a))&&isFinite(a)}function getPos(a){for(var c=0,b=0;a!=null;c+=a.offsetLeft-a.scrollLeft,b+=a.offsetTop,a=a.offsetParent){}return{x:c,y:b}}function getZoomFactor(){var b=1;if(document.body.getBoundingClientRect){var c=document.body.getBoundingClientRect();var d=c.right-c.left;var a=document.body.offsetWidth;b=Math.round((d/a)*100)/100}return b}function getOffset(a,b){if(!a){return}b.x+=a.offsetLeft;b.y+=a.offsetTop;getOffset(a.offsetParent,b)}function getScrolled(b,a){if(!b){return}a.x+=b.scrollLeft;a.y+=b.scrollTop;if(b.tagName.toLowerCase()!="html"){getScrolled(b.parentNode,a)}}function getBox(e){if(e.getBoundingClientRect){var c=e.getBoundingClientRect();x=c.left;y=c.top;w=c.right-c.left;h=c.bottom-c.top;if(navigator.appName.toLowerCase()=="microsoft internet explorer"){x-=document.documentElement.clientLeft;y-=document.documentElement.clientTop;var b=getZoomFactor();if(b!=1){x=Math.round(x/b);y=Math.round(y/b);w=Math.round(w/b);h=Math.round(h/b)}}}else{var d={x:0,y:0};getOffset(e,d);var a={x:0,y:0};getScrolled(e.parentNode,a);x=d.x-a.x;y=d.y-a.y;w=e.offsetWidth;h=e.offsetHeight}return{left:x,top:y,width:w,height:h}}function getWindowSize(){var e=getZoomFactor();var c=0,b=0;if(typeof(window.innerWidth)=="number"){c=window.innerWidth;b=window.innerHeight}else{if(document.documentElement&&(document.documentElement.clientWidth||document.documentElement.clientHeight)){c=document.documentElement.clientWidth;b=document.documentElement.clientHeight}else{if(document.body&&(document.body.clientWidth||document.body.clientHeight)){c=document.body.clientWidth;b=document.body.clientHeight}}}var a=Math.round(c/e);var d=Math.round(b/e);return{width:a,height:d}}function getScrollPositions(){var c;var b;if("pageXOffset" in window){c=window.pageXOffset;b=window.pageYOffset}else{var a=getZoomFactor();c=Math.round(document.documentElement.scrollLeft/a);b=Math.round(document.documentElement.scrollTop/a)}return{left:c,top:b}}function hideDiv(b){var a=document.getElementById(b);if(a){if(a.open){a.hiding=true}else{a.hiding=false}a.style.display="none";a.open=false}}function showCenterDiv(d,e,k,j){var c=document.getElementById(k);if(typeof(j)=="undefined"){j=false}if(j&&c.hiding){return}c.open=true;var m,l;if(self.pageYOffset){m=self.pageXOffset;l=self.pageYOffset}else{if(document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.scrollTop){m=document.documentElement.scrollLeft;l=document.documentElement.scrollTop}else{if(document.body){m=document.body.scrollLeft;l=document.body.scrollTop}}}var g,f;if(self.innerHeight){g=self.innerWidth;f=self.innerHeight}else{if(document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.clientHeight){g=document.documentElement.clientWidth;f=document.documentElement.clientHeight}else{if(document.body){g=document.body.clientWidth;f=document.body.clientHeight}}}var b=m+(g-d)/2;var i=l+(f-e)/2;var a=c.style;a.position="fixed";a.top=i+"px";a.left=b+"px";a.display="block"}function showRelativeDiv(k,c,e,d,i,n,g){var b=document.getElementById(k);if(typeof(e)=="undefined"){e=30}if(typeof(d)=="undefined"){d=30}if(!i){i=1}if(typeof(n)=="undefined"){n=false}if(typeof(g)=="undefined"){g=false}if(g&&b.hiding){return}b.open=true;var m=getPos(c);if(n){var l=getBox(c);e+=l.width}var j=getWindowSize();b.style.top=(m.y+d)+"px";b.style.left=(m.x+e)+"px";b.style.right="auto";b.style.display="";var f=getBox(b);if(n){b.style.left=(m.x+e-f.width)+"px";f=getBox(b)}if(j.width<(f.left+f.width)){if((m.x-f.width)<0){b.style.left="0px";b.style.right="auto"}else{b.style.left="auto";b.style.right=(j.width-m.x)+"px"}}if(j.height<(f.top+f.height)){var a=m.y-f.height;if(a<0){a=0}b.style.top=a+"px"}b.style.display="none";b.style.display="";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity=i}}function showDiv(d,b,a){var c=document.getElementById(d);if(!b){b=1}if(typeof(a)=="undefined"){a=false}if(a&&c.hiding){return}c.open=true;c.style.display="";if(typeof c.style.opacity!=="undefined"){c.style.opacity=b}}function sf_disable_close(){console.log("disable_close");var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){a.dc=true}}function sf_enable_close(){console.log("enable_close");var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){a.dc=false}}function sf_show_tooltip(f,e,c){var b=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(!b){var b=document.createElement("div");b.setAttribute("id","sf_tooltip");b.style.display="none";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity="0"}document.body.appendChild(b)}var i=getPos(c);var a=getWindowSize();b.style.top=(i.y+30)+"px";b.style.left=(i.x+30)+"px";b.style.right="auto";b.className=e;b.innerHTML=f;b.style.display="";var d=getBox(b);if(a.width<(d.left+d.width)){if((i.x-d.width)<0){b.style.left="0px";b.style.right="auto"}else{b.style.left="auto";b.style.right=(a.width-i.x)+"px"}}if(a.height<(d.top+d.height)){var g=i.y-d.height;if(g<0){g=0}b.style.top=g+"px"}b.style.display="none";b.style.display="";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity=0.9}}function sf_hide_tooltip(){var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){if(typeof a.style.opacity!=="undefined"){a.style.opacity="0"}a.style.display="none"}}function sf_tooltip(g,c,e,a,f,d,b){switch(g){case"over":sf_show_tooltip(f,d,b);break;case"out":sf_hide_tooltip();break}return false}var dom_ready_functions=[];function onDomReady(a){dom_ready_functions.push(a)}function addOnloadEvent(a){onDomReady(a)}function addOnmouseupEvent(c,a){if(!a){a=window.document}if(typeof a.addEventListener!="undefined"){a.addEventListener("mouseup",c,false)}else{if(typeof window.attachEvent!="undefined"){a.attachEvent("onmouseup",c)}else{if(a.onmouseup!=null){var b=a.onmouseup;a.onmouseup=function(d){b(d);window[c]()}}else{a.onmouseup=c}}}}var getElementsByClassName=function(b,a,c){if(document.getElementsByClassName){getElementsByClassName=function(k,n,j){j=j||document;var d=j.getElementsByClassName(k),m=(n)?new RegExp("\\b"+n+"\\b","i"):null,e=[],g;for(var f=0,l=d.length;f<l;f+=1){g=d[f];if(!m||m.test(g.nodeName)){e.push(g)}}return e}}else{if(document.evaluate){getElementsByClassName=function(p,s,o){s=s||"*";o=o||document;var g=p.split(" "),q="",m="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml",r=(document.documentElement.namespaceURI===m)?m:null,i=[],d,f;for(var k=0,l=g.length;k<l;k+=1){q+="[contains(concat(' ', @class, ' '), ' "+g[k]+" ')]"}try{d=document.evaluate(".//"+s+q,o,r,0,null)}catch(n){d=document.evaluate(".//"+s+q,o,null,0,null)}while((f=d.iterateNext())){i.push(f)}return i}}else{getElementsByClassName=function(s,v,r){v=v||"*";r=r||document;var i=s.split(" "),u=[],d=(v==="*"&&r.all)?r.all:r.getElementsByTagName(v),q,n=[],p;for(var j=0,e=i.length;j<e;j+=1){u.push(new RegExp("(^|\\s)"+i[j]+"(\\s|$)"))}for(var g=0,t=d.length;g<t;g+=1){q=d[g];p=false;for(var f=0,o=u.length;f<o;f+=1){p=u[f].test(q.className);if(!p){break}}if(p){n.push(q)}}return n}}}return getElementsByClassName(b,a,c)};

       function recaptcha(namespace){
         var url = '/?action=captcha&controller=system&ns={ns}&t={time}';
         var url_data = {ns: namespace, time: new Date().getTime()};
         url = url.substitute(url_data);
         $(namespace+'_captcha_img').src = url;
         $(namespace+'_captcha').value = '';
       }
   </script>

      onDomReady(function() {
     sfUI.locationForm = new sfUI.FormModal({
       url: '/?action=location_form&controller=geo',
       fieldPrefix: 'location_',
       fixed: false,
       title: 'Standort wählen',
       attach: '#loc_primary',
       target: 'loc_primary',
       success_text: 'erfolgreich',
       position: {
         x: ['right', 'inside'],
         y: ['bottom', 'outside']
       },
       addClass: {
         wrapper: 'location_form'
       },
       overlay: true,
       onFormSubmitSuccess: function (modal, jsonObj) {
         if (jsonObj != null && jsonObj.hasOwnProperty('data')) {
           sfUI.userLocation.setData(jsonObj.data);
         } else {
           sfUI.userLocation.loadData();
         }
       }
     });
 
     window.behavior.addEvent('userLocationChanged',function(el){
       sfUI.locationForm.addListeners();
     });
 
   });
     </script>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var social;
 
       onDomReady(function() {
 
         new mBox.Modal({
           title: 'Link',
           content: '<p>Mit folgendem Code können sie direkt auf diese Seite verlinken:</p><textarea onclick="this.select(); return false;" readonly="readonly" rows="2" cols="15">&lt;a href="https://www.schulferien.org/" target="_blank"&gt;Schulferien.org - Ferien, Feiertage, Kalender&lt;/a&gt;</textarea>',

             x: ['center'],

             wrapper: 'link_form'
           }
         });
 
         social = new sfSocial('sf_social_buttons',{
           url: 'https://www.schulferien.org/'
         });
 
         social.addButton(
           new sfSocialButtonTwitter({cssClass:'twitter sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
         social.addButton(
           new sfSocialButtonGooglePlus({cssClass:'googlePlus sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
         social.addButton(
           new sfSocialButtonFacebook({cssClass:'facebook sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
       });
         </script>

        <div class="row">
         <div class="col-md-7">
          <div class="contentbox small_text index_start_text">
           <h4>
            Willkommen bei Schulferien.org, dem Infoportal zum Thema Schulferien, Kalender, Feiertage und mehr
           </h4>
           <p>
            Hier finden Sie neben vielen anderen Infos die aktuellen, zukünftigen und vergangenen Ferientermine 
 	Deutschlands in zahlreichen Darstellungen. Wenn Sie Ihren nächsten Urlaub planen finden Sie hier 
 	immer den aktuellen Ferienkalender. Weiterhin können Sie sich die Ferien als Grafische Darstellung anzeigen lassen.
           </p>
          </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var fscroll;
 
   onDomReady(function() {
     //fscroll = new DragDivScroll( 'ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8', 'body', 'toggle noYBarHide NOSTATUS touchOnlyY' );
     var ajaxSend = false;
     var month = 2;
 
     fscroll = new sfUI.DragScroller('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8',{
       onEndX: function(dragScroller, newScroll){
         if (!ajaxSend) {
           ajaxSend = true;
           var myAjax = new Request.HTML({
             url: '/?action=mt&controller=kalender&m='+month,
             method: 'get',
             headers: {'X-AjaxCache': 'true'},
             append: this.element,
             evalScripts: false,
             onComplete: function(){
               ajaxSend = false;
               month++;
               dragScroller.resetEndEventsSended();
               attach_tooltip();
             }
           });
           myAjax.send();
         }
       },
       endEventOffset: { x:300, y:0 }
     });
 
     var scroll = new Fx.Scroll('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8', {
       wait: false,
       duration: 500,
       offset: {'x': -100, 'y': 0},
       transition: Fx.Transitions.Quad.easeInOut
     });
 
     scroll.toElement('today_5b2ec2f9312f8');
     //$('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8').scrollLeft = $('today_5b2ec2f9312f8').getPosition($('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8')).x;
   });
 
   //expand();
         </script>

    function is_number(a){return !isNaN(parseFloat(a))&&isFinite(a)}function getPos(a){for(var c=0,b=0;a!=null;c+=a.offsetLeft-a.scrollLeft,b+=a.offsetTop,a=a.offsetParent){}return{x:c,y:b}}function getZoomFactor(){var b=1;if(document.body.getBoundingClientRect){var c=document.body.getBoundingClientRect();var d=c.right-c.left;var a=document.body.offsetWidth;b=Math.round((d/a)*100)/100}return b}function getOffset(a,b){if(!a){return}b.x+=a.offsetLeft;b.y+=a.offsetTop;getOffset(a.offsetParent,b)}function getScrolled(b,a){if(!b){return}a.x+=b.scrollLeft;a.y+=b.scrollTop;if(b.tagName.toLowerCase()!="html"){getScrolled(b.parentNode,a)}}function getBox(e){if(e.getBoundingClientRect){var c=e.getBoundingClientRect();x=c.left;y=c.top;w=c.right-c.left;h=c.bottom-c.top;if(navigator.appName.toLowerCase()=="microsoft internet explorer"){x-=document.documentElement.clientLeft;y-=document.documentElement.clientTop;var b=getZoomFactor();if(b!=1){x=Math.round(x/b);y=Math.round(y/b);w=Math.round(w/b);h=Math.round(h/b)}}}else{var d={x:0,y:0};getOffset(e,d);var a={x:0,y:0};getScrolled(e.parentNode,a);x=d.x-a.x;y=d.y-a.y;w=e.offsetWidth;h=e.offsetHeight}return{left:x,top:y,width:w,height:h}}function getWindowSize(){var e=getZoomFactor();var c=0,b=0;if(typeof(window.innerWidth)=="number"){c=window.innerWidth;b=window.innerHeight}else{if(document.documentElement&&(document.documentElement.clientWidth||document.documentElement.clientHeight)){c=document.documentElement.clientWidth;b=document.documentElement.clientHeight}else{if(document.body&&(document.body.clientWidth||document.body.clientHeight)){c=document.body.clientWidth;b=document.body.clientHeight}}}var a=Math.round(c/e);var d=Math.round(b/e);return{width:a,height:d}}function getScrollPositions(){var c;var b;if("pageXOffset" in window){c=window.pageXOffset;b=window.pageYOffset}else{var a=getZoomFactor();c=Math.round(document.documentElement.scrollLeft/a);b=Math.round(document.documentElement.scrollTop/a)}return{left:c,top:b}}function hideDiv(b){var a=document.getElementById(b);if(a){if(a.open){a.hiding=true}else{a.hiding=false}a.style.display="none";a.open=false}}function showCenterDiv(d,e,k,j){var c=document.getElementById(k);if(typeof(j)=="undefined"){j=false}if(j&&c.hiding){return}c.open=true;var m,l;if(self.pageYOffset){m=self.pageXOffset;l=self.pageYOffset}else{if(document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.scrollTop){m=document.documentElement.scrollLeft;l=document.documentElement.scrollTop}else{if(document.body){m=document.body.scrollLeft;l=document.body.scrollTop}}}var g,f;if(self.innerHeight){g=self.innerWidth;f=self.innerHeight}else{if(document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.clientHeight){g=document.documentElement.clientWidth;f=document.documentElement.clientHeight}else{if(document.body){g=document.body.clientWidth;f=document.body.clientHeight}}}var b=m+(g-d)/2;var i=l+(f-e)/2;var a=c.style;a.position="fixed";a.top=i+"px";a.left=b+"px";a.display="block"}function showRelativeDiv(k,c,e,d,i,n,g){var b=document.getElementById(k);if(typeof(e)=="undefined"){e=30}if(typeof(d)=="undefined"){d=30}if(!i){i=1}if(typeof(n)=="undefined"){n=false}if(typeof(g)=="undefined"){g=false}if(g&&b.hiding){return}b.open=true;var m=getPos(c);if(n){var l=getBox(c);e+=l.width}var j=getWindowSize();b.style.top=(m.y+d)+"px";b.style.left=(m.x+e)+"px";b.style.right="auto";b.style.display="";var f=getBox(b);if(n){b.style.left=(m.x+e-f.width)+"px";f=getBox(b)}if(j.width<(f.left+f.width)){if((m.x-f.width)<0){b.style.left="0px";b.style.right="auto"}else{b.style.left="auto";b.style.right=(j.width-m.x)+"px"}}if(j.height<(f.top+f.height)){var a=m.y-f.height;if(a<0){a=0}b.style.top=a+"px"}b.style.display="none";b.style.display="";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity=i}}function showDiv(d,b,a){var c=document.getElementById(d);if(!b){b=1}if(typeof(a)=="undefined"){a=false}if(a&&c.hiding){return}c.open=true;c.style.display="";if(typeof c.style.opacity!=="undefined"){c.style.opacity=b}}function sf_disable_close(){console.log("disable_close");var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){a.dc=true}}function sf_enable_close(){console.log("enable_close");var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){a.dc=false}}function sf_show_tooltip(f,e,c){var b=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(!b){var b=document.createElement("div");b.setAttribute("id","sf_tooltip");b.style.display="none";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity="0"}document.body.appendChild(b)}var i=getPos(c);var a=getWindowSize();b.style.top=(i.y+30)+"px";b.style.left=(i.x+30)+"px";b.style.right="auto";b.className=e;b.innerHTML=f;b.style.display="";var d=getBox(b);if(a.width<(d.left+d.width)){if((i.x-d.width)<0){b.style.left="0px";b.style.right="auto"}else{b.style.left="auto";b.style.right=(a.width-i.x)+"px"}}if(a.height<(d.top+d.height)){var g=i.y-d.height;if(g<0){g=0}b.style.top=g+"px"}b.style.display="none";b.style.display="";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity=0.9}}function sf_hide_tooltip(){var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){if(typeof a.style.opacity!=="undefined"){a.style.opacity="0"}a.style.display="none"}}function sf_tooltip(g,c,e,a,f,d,b){switch(g){case"over":sf_show_tooltip(f,d,b);break;case"out":sf_hide_tooltip();break}return false}var dom_ready_functions=[];function onDomReady(a){dom_ready_functions.push(a)}function addOnloadEvent(a){onDomReady(a)}function addOnmouseupEvent(c,a){if(!a){a=window.document}if(typeof a.addEventListener!="undefined"){a.addEventListener("mouseup",c,false)}else{if(typeof window.attachEvent!="undefined"){a.attachEvent("onmouseup",c)}else{if(a.onmouseup!=null){var b=a.onmouseup;a.onmouseup=function(d){b(d);window[c]()}}else{a.onmouseup=c}}}}var getElementsByClassName=function(b,a,c){if(document.getElementsByClassName){getElementsByClassName=function(k,n,j){j=j||document;var d=j.getElementsByClassName(k),m=(n)?new RegExp("\\b"+n+"\\b","i"):null,e=[],g;for(var f=0,l=d.length;f<l;f+=1){g=d[f];if(!m||m.test(g.nodeName)){e.push(g)}}return e}}else{if(document.evaluate){getElementsByClassName=function(p,s,o){s=s||"*";o=o||document;var g=p.split(" "),q="",m="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml",r=(document.documentElement.namespaceURI===m)?m:null,i=[],d,f;for(var k=0,l=g.length;k<l;k+=1){q+="[contains(concat(' ', @class, ' '), ' "+g[k]+" ')]"}try{d=document.evaluate(".//"+s+q,o,r,0,null)}catch(n){d=document.evaluate(".//"+s+q,o,null,0,null)}while((f=d.iterateNext())){i.push(f)}return i}}else{getElementsByClassName=function(s,v,r){v=v||"*";r=r||document;var i=s.split(" "),u=[],d=(v==="*"&&r.all)?r.all:r.getElementsByTagName(v),q,n=[],p;for(var j=0,e=i.length;j<e;j+=1){u.push(new RegExp("(^|\\s)"+i[j]+"(\\s|$)"))}for(var g=0,t=d.length;g<t;g+=1){q=d[g];p=false;for(var f=0,o=u.length;f<o;f+=1){p=u[f].test(q.className);if(!p){break}}if(p){n.push(q)}}return n}}}return getElementsByClassName(b,a,c)};

       function recaptcha(namespace){
         var url = '/?action=captcha&controller=system&ns={ns}&t={time}';
         var url_data = {ns: namespace, time: new Date().getTime()};
         url = url.substitute(url_data);
         $(namespace+'_captcha_img').src = url;
         $(namespace+'_captcha').value = '';
       }

      onDomReady(function() {
     sfUI.locationForm = new sfUI.FormModal({
       url: '/?action=location_form&controller=geo',
       fieldPrefix: 'location_',
       fixed: false,
       title: 'Standort wählen',
       attach: '#loc_primary',
       target: 'loc_primary',
       success_text: 'erfolgreich',
       position: {
         x: ['right', 'inside'],
         y: ['bottom', 'outside']
       },
       addClass: {
         wrapper: 'location_form'
       },
       overlay: true,
       onFormSubmitSuccess: function (modal, jsonObj) {
         if (jsonObj != null && jsonObj.hasOwnProperty('data')) {
           sfUI.userLocation.setData(jsonObj.data);
         } else {
           sfUI.userLocation.loadData();
         }
       }
     });
 
     window.behavior.addEvent('userLocationChanged',function(el){
       sfUI.locationForm.addListeners();
     });
 
   });
     </script>

          var social;
 
       onDomReady(function() {
 
         new mBox.Modal({
           title: 'Link',
           content: '<p>Mit folgendem Code können sie direkt auf diese Seite verlinken:</p><textarea onclick="this.select(); return false;" readonly="readonly" rows="2" cols="15">&lt;a href="https://www.schulferien.org/" target="_blank"&gt;Schulferien.org - Ferien, Feiertage, Kalender&lt;/a&gt;</textarea>',

           }
         });

           new sfSocialButtonTwitter({cssClass:'twitter sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
         social.addButton(
           new sfSocialButtonGooglePlus({cssClass:'googlePlus sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
         social.addButton(
           new sfSocialButtonFacebook({cssClass:'facebook sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
       });

        <div class="row">
         <div class="col-md-7">
          <div class="contentbox small_text index_start_text">
           <h4>
            Willkommen bei Schulferien.org, dem Infoportal zum Thema Schulferien, Kalender, Feiertage und mehr
           </h4>
           <p>
            Hier finden Sie neben vielen anderen Infos die aktuellen, zukünftigen und vergangenen Ferientermine 
 	Deutschlands in zahlreichen Darstellungen. Wenn Sie Ihren nächsten Urlaub planen finden Sie hier 
 	immer den aktuellen Ferienkalender. Weiterhin können Sie sich die Ferien als Grafische Darstellung anzeigen lassen.
           </p>
          </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var fscroll;
 
   onDomReady(function() {
     //fscroll = new DragDivScroll( 'ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8', 'body', 'toggle noYBarHide NOSTATUS touchOnlyY' );
     var ajaxSend = false;
     var month = 2;
 
     fscroll = new sfUI.DragScroller('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8',{
       onEndX: function(dragScroller, newScroll){
         if (!ajaxSend) {
           ajaxSend = true;
           var myAjax = new Request.HTML({
             url: '/?action=mt&controller=kalender&m='+month,
             method: 'get',
             headers: {'X-AjaxCache': 'true'},
             append: this.element,
             evalScripts: false,
             onComplete: function(){
               ajaxSend = false;
               month++;
               dragScroller.resetEndEventsSended();
               attach_tooltip();
             }
           });
           myAjax.send();
         }
       },
       endEventOffset: { x:300, y:0 }
     });
 
     var scroll = new Fx.Scroll('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8', {
       wait: false,
       duration: 500,
       offset: {'x': -100, 'y': 0},
       transition: Fx.Transitions.Quad.easeInOut
     });
 
     scroll.toElement('today_5b2ec2f9312f8');
     //$('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8').scrollLeft = $('today_5b2ec2f9312f8').getPosition($('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8')).x;
   });
 
   //expand();
         </script>

    function is_number(a){return !isNaN(parseFloat(a))&&isFinite(a)}function getPos(a){for(var c=0,b=0;a!=null;c+=a.offsetLeft-a.scrollLeft,b+=a.offsetTop,a=a.offsetParent){}return{x:c,y:b}}function getZoomFactor(){var b=1;if(document.body.getBoundingClientRect){var c=document.body.getBoundingClientRect();var d=c.right-c.left;var a=document.body.offsetWidth;b=Math.round((d/a)*100)/100}return b}function getOffset(a,b){if(!a){return}b.x+=a.offsetLeft;b.y+=a.offsetTop;getOffset(a.offsetParent,b)}function getScrolled(b,a){if(!b){return}a.x+=b.scrollLeft;a.y+=b.scrollTop;if(b.tagName.toLowerCase()!="html"){getScrolled(b.parentNode,a)}}function getBox(e){if(e.getBoundingClientRect){var c=e.getBoundingClientRect();x=c.left;y=c.top;w=c.right-c.left;h=c.bottom-c.top;if(navigator.appName.toLowerCase()=="microsoft internet explorer"){x-=document.documentElement.clientLeft;y-=document.documentElement.clientTop;var b=getZoomFactor();if(b!=1){x=Math.round(x/b);y=Math.round(y/b);w=Math.round(w/b);h=Math.round(h/b)}}}else{var d={x:0,y:0};getOffset(e,d);var a={x:0,y:0};getScrolled(e.parentNode,a);x=d.x-a.x;y=d.y-a.y;w=e.offsetWidth;h=e.offsetHeight}return{left:x,top:y,width:w,height:h}}function getWindowSize(){var e=getZoomFactor();var c=0,b=0;if(typeof(window.innerWidth)=="number"){c=window.innerWidth;b=window.innerHeight}else{if(document.documentElement&&(document.documentElement.clientWidth||document.documentElement.clientHeight)){c=document.documentElement.clientWidth;b=document.documentElement.clientHeight}else{if(document.body&&(document.body.clientWidth||document.body.clientHeight)){c=document.body.clientWidth;b=document.body.clientHeight}}}var a=Math.round(c/e);var d=Math.round(b/e);return{width:a,height:d}}function getScrollPositions(){var c;var b;if("pageXOffset" in window){c=window.pageXOffset;b=window.pageYOffset}else{var a=getZoomFactor();c=Math.round(document.documentElement.scrollLeft/a);b=Math.round(document.documentElement.scrollTop/a)}return{left:c,top:b}}function hideDiv(b){var a=document.getElementById(b);if(a){if(a.open){a.hiding=true}else{a.hiding=false}a.style.display="none";a.open=false}}function showCenterDiv(d,e,k,j){var c=document.getElementById(k);if(typeof(j)=="undefined"){j=false}if(j&&c.hiding){return}c.open=true;var m,l;if(self.pageYOffset){m=self.pageXOffset;l=self.pageYOffset}else{if(document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.scrollTop){m=document.documentElement.scrollLeft;l=document.documentElement.scrollTop}else{if(document.body){m=document.body.scrollLeft;l=document.body.scrollTop}}}var g,f;if(self.innerHeight){g=self.innerWidth;f=self.innerHeight}else{if(document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.clientHeight){g=document.documentElement.clientWidth;f=document.documentElement.clientHeight}else{if(document.body){g=document.body.clientWidth;f=document.body.clientHeight}}}var b=m+(g-d)/2;var i=l+(f-e)/2;var a=c.style;a.position="fixed";a.top=i+"px";a.left=b+"px";a.display="block"}function showRelativeDiv(k,c,e,d,i,n,g){var b=document.getElementById(k);if(typeof(e)=="undefined"){e=30}if(typeof(d)=="undefined"){d=30}if(!i){i=1}if(typeof(n)=="undefined"){n=false}if(typeof(g)=="undefined"){g=false}if(g&&b.hiding){return}b.open=true;var m=getPos(c);if(n){var l=getBox(c);e+=l.width}var j=getWindowSize();b.style.top=(m.y+d)+"px";b.style.left=(m.x+e)+"px";b.style.right="auto";b.style.display="";var f=getBox(b);if(n){b.style.left=(m.x+e-f.width)+"px";f=getBox(b)}if(j.width<(f.left+f.width)){if((m.x-f.width)<0){b.style.left="0px";b.style.right="auto"}else{b.style.left="auto";b.style.right=(j.width-m.x)+"px"}}if(j.height<(f.top+f.height)){var a=m.y-f.height;if(a<0){a=0}b.style.top=a+"px"}b.style.display="none";b.style.display="";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity=i}}function showDiv(d,b,a){var c=document.getElementById(d);if(!b){b=1}if(typeof(a)=="undefined"){a=false}if(a&&c.hiding){return}c.open=true;c.style.display="";if(typeof c.style.opacity!=="undefined"){c.style.opacity=b}}function sf_disable_close(){console.log("disable_close");var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){a.dc=true}}function sf_enable_close(){console.log("enable_close");var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){a.dc=false}}function sf_show_tooltip(f,e,c){var b=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(!b){var b=document.createElement("div");b.setAttribute("id","sf_tooltip");b.style.display="none";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity="0"}document.body.appendChild(b)}var i=getPos(c);var a=getWindowSize();b.style.top=(i.y+30)+"px";b.style.left=(i.x+30)+"px";b.style.right="auto";b.className=e;b.innerHTML=f;b.style.display="";var d=getBox(b);if(a.width<(d.left+d.width)){if((i.x-d.width)<0){b.style.left="0px";b.style.right="auto"}else{b.style.left="auto";b.style.right=(a.width-i.x)+"px"}}if(a.height<(d.top+d.height)){var g=i.y-d.height;if(g<0){g=0}b.style.top=g+"px"}b.style.display="none";b.style.display="";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity=0.9}}function sf_hide_tooltip(){var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){if(typeof a.style.opacity!=="undefined"){a.style.opacity="0"}a.style.display="none"}}function sf_tooltip(g,c,e,a,f,d,b){switch(g){case"over":sf_show_tooltip(f,d,b);break;case"out":sf_hide_tooltip();break}return false}var dom_ready_functions=[];function onDomReady(a){dom_ready_functions.push(a)}function addOnloadEvent(a){onDomReady(a)}function addOnmouseupEvent(c,a){if(!a){a=window.document}if(typeof a.addEventListener!="undefined"){a.addEventListener("mouseup",c,false)}else{if(typeof window.attachEvent!="undefined"){a.attachEvent("onmouseup",c)}else{if(a.onmouseup!=null){var b=a.onmouseup;a.onmouseup=function(d){b(d);window[c]()}}else{a.onmouseup=c}}}}var getElementsByClassName=function(b,a,c){if(document.getElementsByClassName){getElementsByClassName=function(k,n,j){j=j||document;var d=j.getElementsByClassName(k),m=(n)?new RegExp("\\b"+n+"\\b","i"):null,e=[],g;for(var f=0,l=d.length;f<l;f+=1){g=d[f];if(!m||m.test(g.nodeName)){e.push(g)}}return e}}else{if(document.evaluate){getElementsByClassName=function(p,s,o){s=s||"*";o=o||document;var g=p.split(" "),q="",m="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml",r=(document.documentElement.namespaceURI===m)?m:null,i=[],d,f;for(var k=0,l=g.length;k<l;k+=1){q+="[contains(concat(' ', @class, ' '), ' "+g[k]+" ')]"}try{d=document.evaluate(".//"+s+q,o,r,0,null)}catch(n){d=document.evaluate(".//"+s+q,o,null,0,null)}while((f=d.iterateNext())){i.push(f)}return i}}else{getElementsByClassName=function(s,v,r){v=v||"*";r=r||document;var i=s.split(" "),u=[],d=(v==="*"&&r.all)?r.all:r.getElementsByTagName(v),q,n=[],p;for(var j=0,e=i.length;j<e;j+=1){u.push(new RegExp("(^|\\s)"+i[j]+"(\\s|$)"))}for(var g=0,t=d.length;g<t;g+=1){q=d[g];p=false;for(var f=0,o=u.length;f<o;f+=1){p=u[f].test(q.className);if(!p){break}}if(p){n.push(q)}}return n}}}return getElementsByClassName(b,a,c)};

       function recaptcha(namespace){
         var url = '/?action=captcha&controller=system&ns={ns}&t={time}';
         var url_data = {ns: namespace, time: new Date().getTime()};
         url = url.substitute(url_data);
         $(namespace+'_captcha_img').src = url;
         $(namespace+'_captcha').value = '';
       }

      onDomReady(function() {
     sfUI.locationForm = new sfUI.FormModal({
       url: '/?action=location_form&controller=geo',
       fieldPrefix: 'location_',
       fixed: false,
       title: 'Standort wählen',
       attach: '#loc_primary',
       target: 'loc_primary',
       success_text: 'erfolgreich',
       position: {
         x: ['right', 'inside'],
         y: ['bottom', 'outside']
       },
       addClass: {
         wrapper: 'location_form'
       },
       overlay: true,
       onFormSubmitSuccess: function (modal, jsonObj) {
         if (jsonObj != null && jsonObj.hasOwnProperty('data')) {
           sfUI.userLocation.setData(jsonObj.data);
         } else {
           sfUI.userLocation.loadData();
         }
       }
     });
 
     window.behavior.addEvent('userLocationChanged',function(el){
       sfUI.locationForm.addListeners();
     });
 
   });
     </script>

          var social;

         new mBox.Modal({
           title: 'Link',
           content: '<p>Mit folgendem Code können sie direkt auf diese Seite verlinken:</p><textarea onclick="this.select(); return false;" readonly="readonly" rows="2" cols="15">&lt;a href="https://www.schulferien.org/" target="_blank"&gt;Schulferien.org - Ferien, Feiertage, Kalender&lt;/a&gt;</textarea>',

         );

           new sfSocialButtonFacebook({cssClass:'facebook sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
       });

         <div class="col-md-7">
          <div class="contentbox small_text index_start_text">
           <h4>
            Willkommen bei Schulferien.org, dem Infoportal zum Thema Schulferien, Kalender, Feiertage und mehr
           </h4>
           <p>
            Hier finden Sie neben vielen anderen Infos die aktuellen, zukünftigen und vergangenen Ferientermine 
 	Deutschlands in zahlreichen Darstellungen. Wenn Sie Ihren nächsten Urlaub planen finden Sie hier 
 	immer den aktuellen Ferienkalender. Weiterhin können Sie sich die Ferien als Grafische Darstellung anzeigen lassen.
           </p>
          </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var fscroll;
 
   onDomReady(function() {
     //fscroll = new DragDivScroll( 'ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8', 'body', 'toggle noYBarHide NOSTATUS touchOnlyY' );
     var ajaxSend = false;
     var month = 2;
 
     fscroll = new sfUI.DragScroller('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8',{
       onEndX: function(dragScroller, newScroll){
         if (!ajaxSend) {
           ajaxSend = true;
           var myAjax = new Request.HTML({
             url: '/?action=mt&controller=kalender&m='+month,
             method: 'get',
             headers: {'X-AjaxCache': 'true'},
             append: this.element,
             evalScripts: false,
             onComplete: function(){
               ajaxSend = false;
               month++;
               dragScroller.resetEndEventsSended();
               attach_tooltip();
             }
           });
           myAjax.send();
         }
       },
       endEventOffset: { x:300, y:0 }
     });
 
     var scroll = new Fx.Scroll('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8', {
       wait: false,
       duration: 500,
       offset: {'x': -100, 'y': 0},
       transition: Fx.Transitions.Quad.easeInOut
     });
 
     scroll.toElement('today_5b2ec2f9312f8');
     //$('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8').scrollLeft = $('today_5b2ec2f9312f8').getPosition($('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8')).x;
   });
 
   //expand();
         </script>

    function is_number(a){return !isNaN(parseFloat(a))&&isFinite(a)}function getPos(a){for(var c=0,b=0;a!=null;c+=a.offsetLeft-a.scrollLeft,b+=a.offsetTop,a=a.offsetParent){}return{x:c,y:b}}function getZoomFactor(){var b=1;if(document.body.getBoundingClientRect){var c=document.body.getBoundingClientRect();var d=c.right-c.left;var a=document.body.offsetWidth;b=Math.round((d/a)*100)/100}return b}function getOffset(a,b){if(!a){return}b.x+=a.offsetLeft;b.y+=a.offsetTop;getOffset(a.offsetParent,b)}function getScrolled(b,a){if(!b){return}a.x+=b.scrollLeft;a.y+=b.scrollTop;if(b.tagName.toLowerCase()!="html"){getScrolled(b.parentNode,a)}}function getBox(e){if(e.getBoundingClientRect){var c=e.getBoundingClientRect();x=c.left;y=c.top;w=c.right-c.left;h=c.bottom-c.top;if(navigator.appName.toLowerCase()=="microsoft internet explorer"){x-=document.documentElement.clientLeft;y-=document.documentElement.clientTop;var b=getZoomFactor();if(b!=1){x=Math.round(x/b);y=Math.round(y/b);w=Math.round(w/b);h=Math.round(h/b)}}}else{var d={x:0,y:0};getOffset(e,d);var a={x:0,y:0};getScrolled(e.parentNode,a);x=d.x-a.x;y=d.y-a.y;w=e.offsetWidth;h=e.offsetHeight}return{left:x,top:y,width:w,height:h}}function getWindowSize(){var e=getZoomFactor();var c=0,b=0;if(typeof(window.innerWidth)=="number"){c=window.innerWidth;b=window.innerHeight}else{if(document.documentElement&&(document.documentElement.clientWidth||document.documentElement.clientHeight)){c=document.documentElement.clientWidth;b=document.documentElement.clientHeight}else{if(document.body&&(document.body.clientWidth||document.body.clientHeight)){c=document.body.clientWidth;b=document.body.clientHeight}}}var a=Math.round(c/e);var d=Math.round(b/e);return{width:a,height:d}}function getScrollPositions(){var c;var b;if("pageXOffset" in window){c=window.pageXOffset;b=window.pageYOffset}else{var a=getZoomFactor();c=Math.round(document.documentElement.scrollLeft/a);b=Math.round(document.documentElement.scrollTop/a)}return{left:c,top:b}}function hideDiv(b){var a=document.getElementById(b);if(a){if(a.open){a.hiding=true}else{a.hiding=false}a.style.display="none";a.open=false}}function showCenterDiv(d,e,k,j){var c=document.getElementById(k);if(typeof(j)=="undefined"){j=false}if(j&&c.hiding){return}c.open=true;var m,l;if(self.pageYOffset){m=self.pageXOffset;l=self.pageYOffset}else{if(document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.scrollTop){m=document.documentElement.scrollLeft;l=document.documentElement.scrollTop}else{if(document.body){m=document.body.scrollLeft;l=document.body.scrollTop}}}var g,f;if(self.innerHeight){g=self.innerWidth;f=self.innerHeight}else{if(document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.clientHeight){g=document.documentElement.clientWidth;f=document.documentElement.clientHeight}else{if(document.body){g=document.body.clientWidth;f=document.body.clientHeight}}}var b=m+(g-d)/2;var i=l+(f-e)/2;var a=c.style;a.position="fixed";a.top=i+"px";a.left=b+"px";a.display="block"}function showRelativeDiv(k,c,e,d,i,n,g){var b=document.getElementById(k);if(typeof(e)=="undefined"){e=30}if(typeof(d)=="undefined"){d=30}if(!i){i=1}if(typeof(n)=="undefined"){n=false}if(typeof(g)=="undefined"){g=false}if(g&&b.hiding){return}b.open=true;var m=getPos(c);if(n){var l=getBox(c);e+=l.width}var j=getWindowSize();b.style.top=(m.y+d)+"px";b.style.left=(m.x+e)+"px";b.style.right="auto";b.style.display="";var f=getBox(b);if(n){b.style.left=(m.x+e-f.width)+"px";f=getBox(b)}if(j.width<(f.left+f.width)){if((m.x-f.width)<0){b.style.left="0px";b.style.right="auto"}else{b.style.left="auto";b.style.right=(j.width-m.x)+"px"}}if(j.height<(f.top+f.height)){var a=m.y-f.height;if(a<0){a=0}b.style.top=a+"px"}b.style.display="none";b.style.display="";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity=i}}function showDiv(d,b,a){var c=document.getElementById(d);if(!b){b=1}if(typeof(a)=="undefined"){a=false}if(a&&c.hiding){return}c.open=true;c.style.display="";if(typeof c.style.opacity!=="undefined"){c.style.opacity=b}}function sf_disable_close(){console.log("disable_close");var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){a.dc=true}}function sf_enable_close(){console.log("enable_close");var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){a.dc=false}}function sf_show_tooltip(f,e,c){var b=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(!b){var b=document.createElement("div");b.setAttribute("id","sf_tooltip");b.style.display="none";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity="0"}document.body.appendChild(b)}var i=getPos(c);var a=getWindowSize();b.style.top=(i.y+30)+"px";b.style.left=(i.x+30)+"px";b.style.right="auto";b.className=e;b.innerHTML=f;b.style.display="";var d=getBox(b);if(a.width<(d.left+d.width)){if((i.x-d.width)<0){b.style.left="0px";b.style.right="auto"}else{b.style.left="auto";b.style.right=(a.width-i.x)+"px"}}if(a.height<(d.top+d.height)){var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){if(typeof a.style.opacity!=="undefined"){a.style.opacity="0"}a.style.display="none"}}function sf_tooltip(g,c,e,a,f,d,b){switch(g){case"over":sf_show_tooltip(f,d,b);break;case"out":sf_hide_tooltip();break}return false}var dom_ready_functions=[];function onDomReady(a){dom_ready_functions.push(a)}function addOnloadEvent(a){onDomReady(a)}function addOnmouseupEvent(c,a){if(!a){a=window.document}if(typeof a.addEventListener!="undefined"){a.addEventListener("mouseup",c,false)}else{if(typeof window.attachEvent!="undefined"){a.attachEvent("onmouseup",c)}else{if(a.onmouseup!=null){var b=a.onmouseup;a.onmouseup=function(d){b(d);window[c]()}}else{a.onmouseup=c}}}}var getElementsByClassName=function(b,a,c){if(document.getElementsByClassName){getElementsByClassName=function(k,n,j){j=j||document;var d=j.getElementsByClassName(k),m=(n)?new RegExp("\\b"+n+"\\b","i"):null,e=[],g;for(var f=0,l=d.length;f<l;f+=1){g=d[f];if(!m||m.test(g.nodeName)){e.push(g)}}return e}}else{if(document.evaluate){getElementsByClassName=function(p,s,o){s=s||"*";o=o||document;var g=p.split(" "),q="",m="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml",r=(document.documentElement.namespaceURI===m)?m:null,i=[],d,f;for(var k=0,l=g.length;k<l;k+=1){q+="[contains(concat(' ', @class, ' '), ' "+g[k]+" ')]"}try{d=document.evaluate(".//"+s+q,o,r,0,null)}catch(n){d=document.evaluate(".//"+s+q,o,null,0,null)}while((f=d.iterateNext())){i.push(f)}return        function recaptcha(namespace){
         var url = '/?action=captcha&controller=system&ns={ns}&t={time}';
         var url_data = {ns: namespace, time: new Date().getTime()};
         url = url.substitute(url_data);
         $(namespace+'_captcha_img').src = url;
         $(namespace+'_captcha').value = '';
       }

      onDomReady(function() {
     sfUI.locationForm = new sfUI.FormModal({
       url: '/?action=location_form&controller=geo',
       fieldPrefix: 'location_',
       fixed: false,
       title: 'Standort wählen',
       attach: '#loc_primary',
       target: 'loc_primary',
       success_text: 'erfolgreich',
       position: {
         x: ['right', 'inside'],
         y: ['bottom', 'outside']
       },
       addClass: {
         wrapper: 'location_form'
       },
       overlay: true,
       onFormSubmitSuccess: function (modal, jsonObj) {
         if (jsonObj != null && jsonObj.hasOwnProperty('data')) {
           sfUI.userLocation.setData(jsonObj.data);
         } else {
           sfUI.userLocation.loadData();
         }
       }
     });
 
     window.behavior.addEvent('userLocationChanged',function(el){
       sfUI.locationForm.addListeners();
     });
 
   });

          var social;
 
       onDomReady(function() {
 
         new mBox.Modal({
           title: 'Link',
           content: '<p>Mit folgendem Code können sie direkt auf diese Seite verlinken:</p><textarea onclick="this.select(); return false;" readonly="readonly" rows="2" cols="15">&lt;a href="https://www.schulferien.org/" target="_blank"&gt;Schulferien.org - Ferien, Feiertage, Kalender&lt;/a&gt;</textarea>',

           }
         });

           new sfSocialButtonTwitter({cssClass:'twitter sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
         social.addButton(
           new sfSocialButtonGooglePlus({cssClass:'googlePlus sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
         social.addButton(
           new sfSocialButtonFacebook({cssClass:'facebook sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
       });
         </script>

        <div class="row">
         <div class="col-md-7">
          <div class="contentbox small_text index_start_text">
           <h4>
            Willkommen bei Schulferien.org, dem Infoportal zum Thema Schulferien, Kalender, Feiertage und mehr
           </h4>
           <p>
            Hier finden Sie neben vielen anderen Infos die aktuellen, zukünftigen und vergangenen Ferientermine 
 	Deutschlands in zahlreichen Darstellungen. Wenn Sie Ihren nächsten Urlaub planen finden Sie hier 
 	immer den aktuellen Ferienkalender. Weiterhin können Sie sich die Ferien als Grafische Darstellung anzeigen lassen.
           </p>
          </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var fscroll;
 
   onDomReady(function() {
     //fscroll = new DragDivScroll( 'ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8', 'body', 'toggle noYBarHide NOSTATUS touchOnlyY' );
     var ajaxSend = false;
     var month = 2;
 
     fscroll = new sfUI.DragScroller('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8',{
       onEndX: function(dragScroller, newScroll){
         if (!ajaxSend) {
           ajaxSend = true;
           var myAjax = new Request.HTML({
             url: '/?action=mt&controller=kalender&m='+month,
             method: 'get',
             headers: {'X-AjaxCache': 'true'},
             append: this.element,
             evalScripts: false,
             onComplete: function(){
               ajaxSend = false;
               month++;
               dragScroller.resetEndEventsSended();
               attach_tooltip();
             }
           });
           myAjax.send();
         }
       },
       endEventOffset: { x:300, y:0 }
     });
 
     var scroll = new Fx.Scroll('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8', {
       wait: false,
       duration: 500,
       offset: {'x': -100, 'y': 0},
       transition: Fx.Transitions.Quad.easeInOut
     });
 
     scroll.toElement('today_5b2ec2f9312f8');
     //$('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8').scrollLeft = $('today_5b2ec2f9312f8').getPosition($('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8')).x;
   });
 
   //expand();
         </script>

   <script type="text/javascript">
    function is_number(a){return !isNaN(parseFloat(a))&&isFinite(a)}function getPos(a){for(var c=0,b=0;a!=null;c+=a.offsetLeft-a.scrollLeft,b+=a.offsetTop,a=a.offsetParent){}return{x:c,y:b}}function getZoomFactor(){var b=1;if(document.body.getBoundingClientRect){var c=document.body.getBoundingClientRect();var d=c.right-c.left;var a=document.body.offsetWidth;b=Math.round((d/a)*100)/100}return b}function getOffset(a,b){if(!a){return}b.x+=a.offsetLeft;b.y+=a.offsetTop;getOffset(a.offsetParent,b)}function getScrolled(b,a){if(!b){return}a.x+=b.scrollLeft;a.y+=b.scrollTop;if(b.tagName.toLowerCase()!="html"){getScrolled(b.parentNode,a)}}function getBox(e){if(e.getBoundingClientRect){var c=e.getBoundingClientRect();x=c.left;y=c.top;w=c.right-c.left;h=c.bottom-c.top;if(navigator.appName.toLowerCase()=="microsoft internet explorer"){x-=document.documentElement.clientLeft;y-=document.documentElement.clientTop;var b=getZoomFactor();if(b!=1){x=Math.round(x/b);y=Math.round(y/b);w=Math.round(w/b);h=Math.round(h/b)}}}else{var d={x:0,y:0};getOffset(e,d);var a={x:0,y:0};getScrolled(e.parentNode,a);x=d.x-a.x;y=d.y-a.y;w=e.offsetWidth;h=e.offsetHeight}return{left:x,top:y,width:w,height:h}}function getWindowSize(){var e=getZoomFactor();var c=0,b=0;if(typeof(window.innerWidth)=="number"){c=window.innerWidth;b=window.innerHeight}else{if(document.documentElement&&(document.documentElement.clientWidth||document.documentElement.clientHeight)){c=document.documentElement.clientWidth;b=document.documentElement.clientHeight}else{if(document.body&&(document.body.clientWidth||document.body.clientHeight)){c=document.body.clientWidth;b=document.body.clientHeight}}}var a=Math.round(c/e);var d=Math.round(b/e);return{width:a,height:d}}function getScrollPositions(){var c;var b;if("pageXOffset" in window){c=window.pageXOffset;b=window.pageYOffset}else{var a=getZoomFactor();c=Math.round(document.documentElement.scrollLeft/a);b=Math.round(document.documentElement.scrollTop/a)}return{left:c,top:b}}function hideDiv(b){var a=document.getElementById(b);if(a){if(a.open){a.hiding=true}else{a.hiding=false}a.style.display="none";a.open=false}}function showCenterDiv(d,e,k,j){var c=document.getElementById(k);if(typeof(j)=="undefined"){j=false}if(j&&c.hiding){return}c.open=true;var m,l;if(self.pageYOffset){m=self.pageXOffset;l=self.pageYOffset}else{if(document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.scrollTop){m=document.documentElement.scrollLeft;l=document.documentElement.scrollTop}else{if(document.body){m=document.body.scrollLeft;l=document.body.scrollTop}}}var g,f;if(self.innerHeight){g=self.innerWidth;f=self.innerHeight}else{if(document.documentElement&&document.documentElement.clientHeight){g=document.documentElement.clientWidth;f=document.documentElement.clientHeight}else{if(document.body){g=document.body.clientWidth;f=document.body.clientHeight}}}var b=m+(g-d)/2;var i=l+(f-e)/2;var a=c.style;a.position="fixed";a.top=i+"px";a.left=b+"px";a.display="block"}function showRelativeDiv(k,c,e,d,i,n,g){var b=document.getElementById(k);if(typeof(e)=="undefined"){e=30}if(typeof(d)=="undefined"){d=30}if(!i){i=1}if(typeof(n)=="undefined"){n=false}if(typeof(g)=="undefined"){g=false}if(g&&b.hiding){return}b.open=true;var m=getPos(c);if(n){var l=getBox(c);e+=l.width}var j=getWindowSize();b.style.top=(m.y+d)+"px";b.style.left=(m.x+e)+"px";b.style.right="auto";b.style.display="";var f=getBox(b);if(n){b.style.left=(m.x+e-f.width)+"px";f=getBox(b)}if(j.width<(f.left+f.width)){if((m.x-f.width)<0){b.style.left="0px";b.style.right="auto"}else{b.style.left="auto";b.style.right=(j.width-m.x)+"px"}}if(j.height<(f.top+f.height)){var a=m.y-f.height;if(a<0){a=0}b.style.top=a+"px"}b.style.display="none";b.style.display="";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity=i}}function showDiv(d,b,a){var c=document.getElementById(d);if(!b){b=1}if(typeof(a)=="undefined"){a=false}if(a&&c.hiding){return}c.open=true;c.style.display="";if(typeof c.style.opacity!=="undefined"){c.style.opacity=b}}function sf_disable_close(){console.log("disable_close");var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){a.dc=true}}function sf_enable_close(){console.log("enable_close");var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){a.dc=false}}function sf_show_tooltip(f,e,c){var b=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(!b){var b=document.createElement("div");b.setAttribute("id","sf_tooltip");b.style.display="none";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity="0"}document.body.appendChild(b)}var i=getPos(c);var a=getWindowSize();b.style.top=(i.y+30)+"px";b.style.left=(i.x+30)+"px";b.style.right="auto";b.className=e;b.innerHTML=f;b.style.display="";var d=getBox(b);if(a.width<(d.left+d.width)){if((i.x-d.width)<0){b.style.left="0px";b.style.right="auto"}else{b.style.left="auto";b.style.right=(a.width-i.x)+"px"}}if(a.height<(d.top+d.height)){var g=i.y-d.height;if(g<0){g=0}b.style.top=g+"px"}b.style.display="none";b.style.display="";if(typeof b.style.opacity!=="undefined"){b.style.opacity=0.9}}function sf_hide_tooltip(){var a=document.getElementById("sf_tooltip");if(a){if(typeof a.style.opacity!=="undefined"){a.style.opacity="0"}a.style.display="none"}}function sf_tooltip(g,c,e,a,f,d,b){switch(g){case"over":sf_show_tooltip(f,d,b);break;case"out":sf_hide_tooltip();break}return false}var dom_ready_functions=[];function onDomReady(a){dom_ready_functions.push(a)}function addOnloadEvent(a){onDomReady(a)}function addOnmouseupEvent(c,a){if(!a){a=window.document}if(typeof a.addEventListener!="undefined"){a.addEventListener("mouseup",c,false)}else{if(typeof window.attachEvent!="undefined"){a.attachEvent("onmouseup",c)}else{if(a.onmouseup!=null){var b=a.onmouseup;a.onmouseup=function(d){b(d);window[c]()}}else{a.onmouseup=c}}}}var getElementsByClassName=function(b,a,c){if(document.getElementsByClassName){getElementsByClassName=function(k,n,j){j=j||document;var d=j.getElementsByClassName(k),m=(n)?new RegExp("\\b"+n+"\\b","i"):null,e=[],g;for(var f=0,l=d.length;f<l;f+=1){g=d[f];if(!m||m.test(g.nodeName)){e.push(g)}}return e}}else{if(document.evaluate){getElementsByClassName=function(p,s,o){s=s||"*";o=o||document;var g=p.split(" "),q="",m="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml",r=(document.documentElement.namespaceURI===m)?m:null,i=[],d,f;for(var k=0,l=g.length;k<l;k+=1){q+="[contains(concat(' ', @class, ' '), ' "+g[k]+" ')]"}try{d=document.evaluate(".//"+s+q,o,r,0,null)}catch(n){d=document.evaluate(".//"+s+q,o,null,0,null)}while((f=d.iterateNext())){i.push(f)}return i}}else{getElementsByClassName=function(s,v,r){v=v||"*";r=r||document;var i=s.split(" "),u=[],d=(v==="*"&&r.all)?r.all:r.getElementsByTagName(v),q,n=[],p;for(var j=0,e=i.length;j<e;j+=1){u.push(new RegExp("(^|\\s)"+i[j]+"(\\s|$)"))}for(var g=0,t=d.length;g<t;g+=1){q=d[g];p=false;for(var f=0,o=u.length;f<o;f+=1){p=u[f].test(q.className);if(!p){break}}if(p){n.push(q)}}return n}}}return getElementsByClassName(b,a,c)};

       function recaptcha(namespace){
         var url = '/?action=captcha&controller=system&ns={ns}&t={time}';
         var url_data = {ns: namespace, time: new Date().getTime()};
         url = url.substitute(url_data);
         $(namespace+'_captcha_img').src = url;
         $(namespace+'_captcha').value = '';
       }
   </script>

      onDomReady(function() {
     sfUI.locationForm = new sfUI.FormModal({
       url: '/?action=location_form&controller=geo',
       fieldPrefix: 'location_',
       fixed: false,
       title: 'Standort wählen',
       attach: '#loc_primary',
       target: 'loc_primary',
       success_text: 'erfolgreich',
       position: {
         x: ['right', 'inside'],
         y: ['bottom', 'outside']
       },
       addClass: {
         wrapper: 'location_form'
       },
       overlay: true,
       onFormSubmitSuccess: function (modal, jsonObj) {
         if (jsonObj != null && jsonObj.hasOwnProperty('data')) {
           sfUI.userLocation.setData(jsonObj.data);
         } else {
           sfUI.userLocation.loadData();
         }
       }
     });
 
     window.behavior.addEvent('userLocationChanged',function(el){
       sfUI.locationForm.addListeners();
     });
 
   });

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var social;
 
       onDomReady(function() {
 
         new mBox.Modal({
           title: 'Link',
           content: '<p>Mit folgendem Code können sie direkt auf diese Seite verlinken:</p><textarea onclick="this.select(); return false;" readonly="readonly" rows="2" cols="15">&lt;a href="https://www.schulferien.org/" target="_blank"&gt;Schulferien.org - Ferien, Feiertage, Kalender&lt;/a&gt;</textarea>',

             x: ['center'],

             wrapper: 'link_form'
           }
         });
 
         social = new sfSocial('sf_social_buttons',{
           url: 'https://www.schulferien.org/'
         });
 
         social.addButton(
           new sfSocialButtonTwitter({cssClass:'twitter sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
         social.addButton(
           new sfSocialButtonGooglePlus({cssClass:'googlePlus sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
         social.addButton(
           new sfSocialButtonFacebook({cssClass:'facebook sf_tb_btn', button_only: true})
         );
 
       });
         </script>

        <div class="row">
         <div class="col-md-7">
          <div class="contentbox small_text index_start_text">
           <h4>
            Willkommen bei Schulferien.org, dem Infoportal zum Thema Schulferien, Kalender, Feiertage und mehr
           </h4>
           <p>
            Hier finden Sie neben vielen anderen Infos die aktuellen, zukünftigen und vergangenen Ferientermine 
 	Deutschlands in zahlreichen Darstellungen. Wenn Sie Ihren nächsten Urlaub planen finden Sie hier 
 	immer den aktuellen Ferienkalender. Weiterhin können Sie sich die Ferien als Grafische Darstellung anzeigen lassen.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          var fscroll;
 
   onDomReady(function() {
     //fscroll = new DragDivScroll( 'ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8', 'body', 'toggle noYBarHide NOSTATUS touchOnlyY' );
     var ajaxSend = false;
     var month = 2;
 
     fscroll = new sfUI.DragScroller('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8',{
       onEndX: function(dragScroller, newScroll){
         if (!ajaxSend) {
           ajaxSend = true;
           var myAjax = new Request.HTML({
             url: '/?action=mt&controller=kalender&m='+month,
             method: 'get',
             headers: {'X-AjaxCache': 'true'},
             append: this.element,
             evalScripts: false,
             onComplete: function(){
               ajaxSend = false;
               month++;
               dragScroller.resetEndEventsSended();
               attach_tooltip();
             }
           });
           myAjax.send();
         }
       },
       endEventOffset: { x:300, y:0 }
     });
 
     var scroll = new Fx.Scroll('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8', {
       wait: false,
       duration: 500,
       offset: {'x': -100, 'y': 0},
       transition: Fx.Transitions.Quad.easeInOut
     });
 
     scroll.toElement('today_5b2ec2f9312f8');
     //$('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8').scrollLeft = $('today_5b2ec2f9312f8').getPosition($('ferien_long_panel_ferien_5b2ec2f9312f8')).x;
   });
 
   //expand();
         </script>

                 </div>\
               </div>\
             </form>',

             x: ['center'],

             wrapper: 'feedback_form'
           },
           overlay: false,
           onOpen: function() {
             if (!this.initCaptcha){
               recaptcha('feedback_mb');
               this.initCaptcha = true;
             }
           },
           onFormSubmitError: function(){
             recaptcha('feedback_mb')
           }
         });
       });
